knee.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the joint that bends in the middle of your leg
knee.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Lucy had a bandage round her knee.
Tim fell to his knees and started to pray.
She was on her knees  (=kneeling), weeding the garden.
knee.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the part of your clothes that covers your knee
knee.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: His jeans had holes in both knees.
knee.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to hit someone with your knee
knee.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: I kneed him in the groin.
